summary: A small ring found in Elgrim\'s Elixirs that provides a constant 50% Spell Absorption effect when worn. Can be disenchanted.
descriptionHtml:
I wanted a small ring that provided an enchantment that is delightfully overpowered that I can put on something else, but being too lazy to search around for one, I made my own and threw it on the counter of Elgrim\'s Elixirs in Riften. It\'s not owned by anybody, and I have no idea if it\'ll show up anywhere else. Don\'t expect a professional, serious mod from this, since it\'s my first.

Apologies if it doesn\'t download properly through the NMM. If that happens, just install it manually.
author: Kanohispider
